objects.text: X-Trans CMOS Sensor • Premium Build • Manual Controls • Wi-Fi Connectivity
Compact Design • Interchangeable Lens System • Film Simulation Modes

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS sensor for exceptional image quality
• Premium build quality with durable metal construction
• Multiple manual control dials for precise shooting settings
• High-performance interchangeable lens system
• Electronic viewfinder for accurate composition
• Tiltable LCD screen for creative angle shooting
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing
• Advanced autofocus system for sharp captures
• Compatible with Fujifilm's extensive X-mount lens lineup
• Compact and lightweight body ideal for travel photography
• Film simulation modes for creative photography

banner_details:
This banner features a product promotion design with a sleek and modern aesthetic. The background is composed of dark concentric circles and geometric accents, providing depth without distraction. At the top, a bold title text (`heading`) uses a clean, heavyweight sans-serif font in white. Below it, a smaller subheading (`subheading`) appears in red, drawing immediate attention to the promotional tagline.

Central to the layout is a high-resolution image of a camera (`product_image`), which serves as the visual anchor. Two descriptive text layers (`description_1` and `description_2`) highlight product features using a clean white font with a touch of gray for secondary details.

The price (`price`) is prominently displayed in large, red-colored typography, adding urgency. A bold red rectangular button (`cta_background`) with centered white text (`cta`) communicates a time-sensitive call-to-action.

**Color Palette:**
- Background: #1a1a1a (Charcoal Black)
- Primary Text: #FFFFFF (White)
- Accent/CTA: #e63946 (Vivid Red)
- Secondary Feature Text: #CCCCCC (Cool Gray)
product_color: The product image of the Fujifilm X-T10 camera features a sleek and professional color palette dominated by rich blacks and metallic accents. The body is primarily matte black (#1C1C1C), lending a modern and premium feel, while glossy highlights on the lens and dials add depth and contrast. Subtle silver-gray (#A9A9A9) markings and text create legibility without overpowering the design. A hint of red-orange (#E4572E) near the lens adds vibrancy, subtly guiding the viewer’s eye. The lens glass reflects pale green (#A4D5C1) and warm gold (#F4C542) tones, adding dimension. These complementary tones provide an ideal mix for a bold and elegant advertisement banner.
